meanings.definition: Improve or surpass in quality or value.
meanings.sent1: She is bettering her grades by studying hard every day.
meanings.sent2: He is bettering his skills by practicing regularly.
meanings.sent3: The chef is bettering his signature dish by adding a secret ingredient.
meanings.sent4: With each stroke, the artist is bettering the masterpiece on the canvas.
meanings.sent5: The athlete is bettering her personal record with each race she runs.

meanings.sent1: They are bettering the community by volunteering at the local shelter.
meanings.sent2: The company is bettering its products to meet customer demands.
meanings.sent3: The magician is bettering his tricks to impress the audience even more.
meanings.sent4: Like a caterpillar transforming into a butterfly, she is bettering herself every day.
meanings.sent5: The sun bettering the day with its warm rays shining through the clouds.
